column1: Little Goat Diner////Had a 40 min wait so my friend and I went next door to get some coffee. I got a vanilla latte and it was delish and a good way to sit and wait. For food
column2: my friend got the paratha burrito (we're Indian
column3: so she was curious lol) and I got the Los Drowned and we split a side of Mac and cheese. The main dishes were great
column4: I wolfed down my sandwich and the dip was so so good. But the Mac and cheese was disappointing
column5: kind of dry and not very cheesy. Otherwise though
column6: we enjoyed everything from service to atmosphere.
